Bash(docker-compose exec backend python -c "
from app.db.database import SessionLocal
from app.models.sys2_requirement import SYS2RequirementDB
from sqlalchemy import func

db = SessionLocal()
# Find Melco IDs with multiple records
result = db.query(SYS2RequirementDB.melco_id, func.count(SYS2RequirementDB.id).label(''count'')).group_by(SYS2RequirementDB.melco_id).having(func.count(SYS2RequirementDB.id) > 1).limit(5).all()

print(''Melco IDs with multiple SYS.2 records:'')
for melco_id, count in result:
    print(f''{melco_id}: {count} records'')
")
